meanings.definition: To put a new jacket on (something).
meanings.sent1: She was rejacketing her favorite book to protect it.
meanings.sent2: The company is rejacketing all their products for the upcoming season.
meanings.sent3: The librarian joked about rejacketing the books in rainbow colors.
meanings.sent4: The concept of rejacketing old ideas with new perspectives is intriguing.
meanings.sent5: Rejacketing can make old things look brand new again.

meanings.definition: The act of replacing a jacket on (something).
meanings.sent1: The rejacketing of the sofa made it look more stylish.
meanings.sent2: I noticed the rejacketing of the old magazines in the waiting room.
meanings.sent3: The rejacketing of the car seats with fluffy covers was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The rejacketing of the building facade transformed its appearance.
meanings.sent5: The rejacketing process can give a fresh look to worn-out items.
